mapper.select:
select
from da_iot_monitor_data where 1 = 1
and id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(add_time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginAddTime})
AND unix_timestamp(add_time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endAddTime})
and display_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and hid = #{EntityRelated.hid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and id = #{EntityRelated.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sensor_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.sensorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND unix_timestamp(time)>=unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.beginTime})
AND unix_timestamp(time)<unix_timestamp(#{EntityRelated.endTime})
and unit LIKE CONCAT('%',#{EntityRelated.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by
${Order.columnName}
ASC
DESC
